alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:04PM CDT until March 26 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR RANKIN...NORTHERN SMITH...SCOTT AND SOUTHEASTERN HINDS COUNTIES... At 603 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hillsboro to near Terry, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 540 PM, trees and power lines were reported down across Highway 43 north of Pelahatchie. There have been numerous reports of large hail across the greater Jackson area. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Pearl, Brandon, Flowood, Richland, Forest, Morton, Star, Harperville, Florence, Raymond, Pelahatchie, Homewood, Leesburg, Goshen Springs, Ludlow, Pulaski, Piney Woods, Pisgah and Forkville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
